name: Genetically Blessed Height
prerequisites: Height > 180cm, CHA 13+
description: Your towering presence commands attention in every hostel common room and dating app
benefits: +4 CHA for each 10cm over 180cm; Targets have Disadvantage on WIS Saves vs your Persuasion (Dating); +2 Intimidation (Southeast Asia); CON Save DC 15 daily or lose benefits from slouching

name: Clean Freak
prerequisites: WIS 14+, Proficiency in Survival, Must maintain hygiene score >85
description: You cannot tolerate the filth of shared accommodations
benefits: +3 CON Saves vs Disease; -2 CHA (Authentic Experience Seekers); Advantage on Perception (Bed Bugs); Must spend 1hr daily on cleaning rituals or lose benefits; Auto-fail Stealth in dirty environments

name: Super Well Traveled
prerequisites: Visited 50+ countries, Proficiency in Survival, Speaks 3+ languages
description: You've been everywhere and won't let anyone forget it
benefits: +5 INT (History/Geography checks); +3 Persuasion (Travel Stories); -4 Insight (cultural assumptions); Must mention country count in every conversation or take 1d4 psychic damage

name: Hot Athletic Body
prerequisites: STR or DEX 16+, CON 14+, Must post gym selfies weekly
description: Your chiseled physique was forged in hotel gyms and beach workouts
benefits: +3 CHA (Fitness NPCs); +2 CR (unarmored); Advantage on Performance (Beach Clubs); -2 Stealth (everyone stares); Must work out 5x per week or lose 1 CON per week; Disadvantage on Persuasion (Non-Athletic NPCs)

name: Dangerous Countries Veteran
prerequisites: Proficiency in Survival, CON 13+, Visited 5+ high-risk destinations
description: You laugh at other nomads' fear of petty crime
benefits: +4 Intimidation; Immunity to Frightened; +3 Survival (Urban); -3 WIS (overconfidence); Bonus Action: War Stories (DC 14 WIS Save or target becomes Charmed or Annoyed)

name: Fresh Off the Plane
prerequisites: Must have arrived <30 days ago, WIS <12, Bank account >5000 GP
description: Everything is amazing and you have no idea what you're doing yet
benefits: +2 CHA (First Impressions); Advantage on Persuasion (Making Friends); -4 Insight (Scam Detection); -3 INT (Local Language); +2 Performance (Photography); Lose feat after 30 days or first major scam; Immunity to Exhaustion (Cynicism)

name: Connoisseur of Fine Things
prerequisites: CHA 14+, Proficiency in Performance, Monthly income >4000 GP
description: You only eat at the best spots and let everyone know
benefits: Advantage on Investigation (Quality Detection); +3 Persuasion (Upscale Establishments); -5 CHA (Budget Travelers); +2 Investigation (Hidden Gems); Must spend 500+ GP per week on dining or suffer 2d6 psychic damage; Disadvantage on CON Saves (Street Food)

name: Big Bank Account
prerequisites: Passive income >10000 GP/month, Proficiency in INT (Finance) or INT (Crypto)
description: Your wealth allows you to live above the concerns of mere mortals
benefits: +4 CHA (Capitalist Societies); Advantage on Persuasion (Money-Related); Can reroll any failed check by spending 100 GP; -6 Insight (Normal Struggles); Disadvantage on Persuasion (Low Income NPCs); Lose feat if passive income drops below threshold

name: Visa Runner
prerequisites: DEX 12+, Proficiency in Deception, No work permit
description: You've mastered the art of border hopping every 30-90 days
benefits: +5 Deception (Work Questions); Advantage on INT (Travel Planning); -2 WIS (Long-Term Planning); +3 Stealth (Cafe Working); Must leave country before visa expires or take 3d10 psychic damage; Disadvantage on Persuasion (Lasting Relationships)

name: Coffee Shop Warrior
prerequisites: Must own laptop >1500 GP, Proficiency in Remote Work, CON 13+
description: You've conquered the WiFi jungles and claimed your corner table
benefits: +2 INT (Work Checks in Cafes); Advantage on Perception (Power Outlets); -3 CHA (Cafe Staff); Immunity to social pressure to leave; +4 Perception (WiFi Speed); Must order something every 3 hours or take 1d6 psychic damage

name: Digital Detox Believer
prerequisites: WIS 15+, Survived 7+ day retreat, CHA 13+
description: You've found yourself through disconnection and healing
benefits: +3 WIS (Meditation); Advantage on WIS Saves vs Phone Addiction; -4 CON (Maintaining Detox); +5 Persuasion (Presence Preaching); Must attend wellness retreat quarterly or gain Anxious condition; Must post about digital detox on social media within 24hrs of ending (Irony Immunity)

name: Crypto Bro
prerequisites: INT 12+, Proficiency in Technology, Lost money at least once
description: Your entire personality revolves around blockchain and the future
benefits: +5 Persuasion (Crypto Explanations); Advantage on Investigation (Investment Opportunities); -6 WIS (Financial Risk); +3 Deception (Convincing Others to Invest); Action: Bore NPC (DC 16 WIS Save or target leaves); Wealth fluctuates wildly (1d100% weekly)

name: Perpetual Networker
prerequisites: CHA 15+, Proficiency in Performance, Attended 10+ networking events
description: Every interaction is an opportunity to exchange LinkedIn profiles
benefits: +4 Persuasion (Professional Settings); Advantage on CHA (Business Contacts); -3 WIS (Genuine Friendships); +2 Performance (Personal Brand); Must collect 5 business cards per week or gain FOMO condition; Cannot have casual conversation without mentioning synergy

name: Yoga Instructor Certificate
prerequisites: DEX 14+, WIS 13+, Completed 200hr training in Bali
description: You teach yoga to fund your travels and spiritual journey
benefits: +3 Acrobatics; +3 Athletics; +2 Persuasion (Spiritual Seekers); -4 CHA (Non-Yoga Topics); Advantage on finding accommodation (Work Trade); +2 CHA (Yoga Pants); Must practice daily or -2 DEX; -3 WIS (Material Concerns)

name: Instagram Influencer
prerequisites: CHA 16+, Proficiency in Performance, Followers >10000
description: Your life looks perfect through the Valencia filter
benefits: +5 Deception (Hiding Reality); Advantage on Persuasion (Free Stuff); -5 WIS (Experiencing Moments); +4 Performance; Can earn GP through sponsored posts; Must post daily or lose followers (1d100 per day); -3 WIS (Believe Own Content); Take 2d6 psychic damage per negative comment

name: Minimalist (Owns MacBook Pro)
prerequisites: Must own <50 items valued >15000 GP total, WIS 12+
description: You've embraced minimalism with only the essentials: laptop, camera, designer clothes
benefits: Advantage on DEX (Packing); +2 WIS Saves; -5 Insight (Self-Awareness); +3 Persuasion (Minimalism Preaching); Must tell everyone about minimalism or take 1d8 psychic damage; Owns 'only essentials' worth more than most people's everything

name: Polyglot Pretender
prerequisites: INT 12+, Knows basic phrases in 8+ languages, Actual fluency in 0-1
description: You've collected languages like Pokemon but can't actually speak any well
benefits: +2 CHA (First Impressions Any Country); Advantage on Persuasion (Ordering Food/Beer); -4 INT (Sustained Foreign Conversations); +3 CHA (Locals Appreciate Effort); Disadvantage on INT (Complex Topics); Must practice Duolingo daily or lose streaks and gain Burnout

name: NFT Profile Picture Owner
prerequisites: Paid 500+ ETH for jpeg, CHA 10+, WIS 6-
description: You own a unique digital asset that will definitely retain value
benefits: Right-click save immunity (self-perceived); +5 Persuasion (Crypto Circles); -8 CHA (Normies); +1 Deception (Investment Pretense); Wealth: -90% (instant); Must explain NFTs to confused NPCs (exhausting); Can be Cringed at will

name: Startup Founder (Between Ventures)
prerequisites: Failed 1+ businesses, CHA 14+, Currently unemployed
description: You're not unemployed, you're an entrepreneur having a strategic pause
benefits: +4 Persuasion (Pitching Ideas); Advantage on Performance (Sounding Impressive); -6 WIS (Admitting Failure); +3 Deception (Reframing Unemployment); Can pivot at any moment; -5 GP Income; +5 CHA Saves vs Embarrassment; Roll d20 at creation: on 1-5 gain Sociopathic trait

name: Ayahuasca Enlightened
prerequisites: CON 13+, WIS 8-, Survived plant medicine ceremony
description: You've seen the truth and everyone else is asleep
benefits: Advantage on Insight (Self-Perceived Only); +3 Persuasion (Spiritual Seekers); -6 CHA (Non-Enlightened Beings); +5 Performance (Rambling About Oneness); Must microdose and talk about it; -4 CHA (Normal Conversations); Grant Disadvantage to anyone tired of hearing about it

name: Unix Enlightened
prerequisites: INT 16+, Proficiency in Technology, Must use Arch Linux, CHA 8-
description: You daily drive Linux and need everyone to know Windows/Mac are for peasants
benefits: +5 INT (Technology); +3 Investigation (Debugging); Advantage on INT (Hacking/Security); -6 CHA (Insufferable); +4 INT (Programming); Must explain why your setup is superior (DC 15 WIS Save or target becomes Annoyed); Cannot help without saying 'RTFM'; -3 Persuasion (Non-Technical People)

name: Nip Tuck
prerequisites: CHA appears 16+, actual age 40+, Spent >50000 GP on procedures
description: Strategic surgical investments maintain your competitive edge in the nomad dating scene
benefits: +6 CHA (Appearance Only); +4 Deception (Age); -4 WIS (Life Decisions); Advantage on CHA (First Impressions); -3 CON (Recovery Needed); Must maintain treatments quarterly or appear +2d4 years in 1 month; Take 3d6 psychic damage if someone guesses procedures; +2 Intimidation (Uncanny Valley)

name: Always High On Something
prerequisites: CON 14+, Proficiency in Survival (Substance Procurement), WIS 9-
description: You've achieved a permanent state of altered consciousness
benefits: Advantage on INT (Creative Thinking); +4 Performance (Everything is Funny); -5 Perception; +3 Persuasion (Other Users); -6 INT (Memory Checks); Immunity to Stressed and Anxious; -4 Vibe Check (Slow Reactions); +2 Insight (Different Perspective); Must resupply every 2 days or Disadvantage on all checks

name: Heavy Drinker
prerequisites: CON 15+, Proficiency in CON (Alcohol), CHA 12+
description: You're not an alcoholic, you're just living the expat lifestyle
benefits: +5 CON Saves vs Alcohol; +4 CHA (Bars/Nightlife); Advantage on Persuasion (Drunk Friends); -3 WIS; +3 Intimidation (Drinking Contests); -2 DEX (Morning Activities); Must drink daily or become Irritable condition; Take 1d6 necrotic damage to Chill per week; +6 Persuasion (Other Drinkers); Auto-fail INT (Last Night Recall)

name: Actual Polyglot
prerequisites: INT 18+, Speaks 5+ languages fluently, Spent years studying
description: You genuinely learned languages and are surrounded by people faking it
benefits: +8 INT (Language Checks); Advantage on INT (Translation); +4 Insight (Detect Fake Polyglots); +3 CHA (Impressed Locals); -6 WIS (Patience with Duolingo Warriors); Can communicate in any situation; +5 Investigation (Understanding Documents); -2 CHA (Monolingual People); Must correct others' grammar (compulsive)

name: Pretending To Be Not Remote
prerequisites: Proficiency in Deception, Active work-from-home job, CHA 13+
description: You're definitely on vacation and those Zoom calls are just catching up with family
benefits: +6 Deception (Work Questions); Advantage on Stealth (Hiding Laptop Work); +4 Performance (Casual Tourist Act); -3 WIS (Actually Relaxing); Must maintain cover story (DC 14 Deception) or face visa consequences; +2 Stealth (Working Covertly); Take 2d8 psychic damage from living double life; -4 CHA (Forming Genuine Connections)

name: Trying To Pass As Local
prerequisites: CHA 14+, Proficiency in Local Language, Lived 6+ months, WIS 10-
description: You wear local clothes, use local slang, and insist you're basically from here now
benefits: +4 Stealth (Blending In); +3 INT (Local Language); -5 Insight (Self-Awareness); +2 Persuasion (Locals); -6 CHA (Other Expats); Advantage on Persuasion (Avoiding Tourist Prices); Disadvantage on Admitting Foreign Status; Take 2d6 psychic damage when someone speaks English to you automatically; Must constantly correct others about local culture

name: Never Lost
prerequisites: WIS 16+, Proficiency in Survival, DEX 13+
description: Your internal GPS is flawless and you refuse to acknowledge any wrong turns
benefits: +7 Survival (Navigation); Advantage on Survival (Urban); +4 Perception (Spatial Awareness); -8 CHA (Asking for Directions); Auto-succeed on finding destinations; +3 Persuasion (Leading Groups); -5 WIS (Admitting Mistakes); Can 'shortcut' but takes 2x longer; DC 18 WIS Save to admit error

name: Obsessed Food & Drink Knower
prerequisites: INT 14+, Proficiency in Local Cuisine, CHA 15+, Tried 100+ establishments
description: You've made finding the best spots your entire personality and mission
benefits: +6 Investigation (Finding Restaurants); +5 Persuasion (Recommendations); Advantage on Perception (Quality Food); +4 INT (Food Lore); -4 WIS (Eating Without Research); Must tell everyone about hidden gems; Cannot walk past a place without reviewing it; +3 CHA (Foodies); -5 CON (Enjoying Chains); Take 1d10 psychic damage if someone finds a better spot first

name: Blogger Vlogger
prerequisites: CHA 14+, Proficiency in Performance, Followers 1000-10000
description: You document everything for your 'audience' of mostly bots and your mom
benefits: +4 Performance; +3 DEX (Photography/Videography); Advantage on INT (Remembering Experiences via Footage); -6 WIS (Living in the Moment); +2 Persuasion (Building Audience); Must create content daily or gain Purposeless condition; -3 WIS (Privacy); +5 Deception (Marketing Yourself); Take 1d6 psychic damage per day of not posting; -5 Speed (Equipment Weight)

name: Livestreamer
prerequisites: CHA 16+, Proficiency in Technology (Streaming), Followers 5000+, CON 14+
description: Your life is broadcast 24/7 to the world (dozens of viewers)
benefits: +5 Performance; +6 INT (Multitasking); Advantage on INT (Documentation); +4 INT (Technology); -10 WIS (Experiencing Anything Privately); Must stream 6+ hours daily; +3 GP Income (Donations); Cannot turn off performer personality; -4 CHA (Genuine Relationships); +2 Persuasion (Practiced Speaker); Take 3d6 psychic damage from trolls; -3 WIS (Boundaries)

name: Unaware Tourist
prerequisites: WIS 6-, CHA 14+, Ignorance is bliss trait
description: You wander with pure joy, completely oblivious to scams, dangers, and social faux pas
benefits: +5 CON Saves vs Stress; Advantage on WIS Saves vs Worry; +4 CHA (Innocent Charm); -8 Insight (Detect Scams); Immunity to Cringed condition; +3 Persuasion (Non-Threatening); Auto-fail INT (Cultural Awareness); -6 WIS (Avoiding Tourist Traps); +4 Luck; Take no psychic damage from mistakes; Must overpay for everything

name: Badly Dressed Foreigner
prerequisites: CHA 10-, Zero fashion sense, WIS 12+, Comfort over style
description: Your socks-with-sandals and cargo shorts announce your origin from miles away
benefits: +4 CON (Comfort); +3 STR (Carrying Capacity via Pockets); Advantage on Stealth vs Pickpockets; -7 CHA (Fashion-Conscious Areas); +2 Intimidation (Fashion Offense); Immunity to social pressure about appearance; -5 CHA (Romantic Encounters); +4 Perception (Other Badly Dressed Foreigners); Cannot enter nice establishments; +3 CON (Practical Footwear)

name: Perpetually Sick
prerequisites: CON 8-, Visited 20+ countries, Immunity system broken
description: Your stomach hasn't been solid since 2019 and you've accepted this as life now
benefits: +5 CON (Endurance - Used To It); Advantage on CON Saves (Adapted); +4 WIS (Medicine/Self-Treatment); -6 CON (Daily Energy); +3 Survival (Can Eat Anything Now); +4 CHA (Sympathy Bonus When Sick); +2 CHA (Bonding Over Illnesses); Must rest frequently; -3 STR (Physical Activities); Immunity to Frightened (Food Poisoning); Unintended weight loss

name: Scam Victim (Veteran)
prerequisites: WIS 8-, CHA 16+, Scammed 5+ times, Still optimistic
description: You've fallen for every scam but somehow keep trusting people
benefits: +6 CHA (Likeable Naivety); Advantage on Persuasion (Making Friends); +4 Persuasion (People Want to Help); -9 Insight; +5 WIS Saves vs Cynicism; -4 GP Retention; Auto-fail Insight (Detecting Cons); +3 WIS (Forgiveness); NPCs feel protective of you; -500 GP per month (Average Scam Losses); +4 CHA (Second Chances)

name: Chronic Oversharer
prerequisites: CHA 13+, WIS 9-, No filter, Proficiency in Performance
description: Within 5 minutes of meeting you, people know your trauma, finances, and medical history
benefits: +5 CHA (Fast Connections); Advantage on Persuasion (Vulnerability Bonding); +4 Persuasion (Authenticity); -7 WIS (Boundaries); +3 Performance (Storytelling); -5 CHA (Mystery/Intrigue); Auto-reveal secrets (compulsive); +6 CHA (Relating to Others); -4 CHA (Professional Reputation); Must share personal info constantly or take 1d8 psychic damage; Disadvantage on Deception (Keeping Secrets)

name: Everything Was Better Back Home
prerequisites: WIS 10-, CHA 10-, Constantly complaining
description: Every experience is worse than the equivalent in your home country
benefits: +4 INT (Critical Analysis); Advantage on Perception (Quality Issues); +3 Investigation (Finding Flaws); -8 WIS (Enjoying Anything); +2 CHA (Other Complainers); -6 CHA (Locals); Must complain about 3+ things per hour; +5 WIS (High Standards); -4 WIS (Adaptation); Immunity to FOMO; Disadvantage on WIS Saves (Gratitude); -3 CHA (Local Friends)

name: Extreme Cheapskate
prerequisites: WIS 13+, Proficiency in Persuasion (Haggling), Must have money but refuse to spend
description: You'll walk 2 hours to save 50 cents and brag about it
benefits: +6 Persuasion (Haggling); Advantage on Investigation (Deals); +4 Investigation (Cheap Options); +5 GP Savings; -7 CHA (Annoying About Prices); -3 CON (Quality of Life); +3 INT (Price Research); Must choose cheapest option always; -5 CHA (Tipping); +2 CON (Discomfort Tolerance); Cannot spend on convenience; -4 CHA (Splitting Bills); Take 1d4 psychic damage if someone got better price

name: Trust Fund Kid
prerequisites: Passive income >8000 GP/month from family, CHA 13+, WIS 8-, Never had real job
description: You're 'finding yourself' on your parents' money while calling it entrepreneurship
benefits: +5 CHA (Unearned Confidence); Advantage on WIS Saves (Risk-Taking with Safety Net); +4 Persuasion (Well-Spoken); -8 Insight (Understanding Struggle); +6 GP (Funding Passion Projects); -6 CON (Work Ethic); Immunity to Financial Consequences; +3 CHA (Polished); -9 CHA (Working Class); Can fail infinitely; Must pretend it's your money; -4 Persuasion (Discussing Success)

name: Burned Out Ex-Corporate
prerequisites: CON 12-, WIS 15+, Former high-stress job, Savings burning away
description: You quit the rat race to find yourself and are having an existential crisis about it
benefits: +5 Insight (Life Perspective); Advantage on Insight (Corporate BS); +4 WIS Saves; -6 DEX (Productivity); +3 INT (Philosophy); -5 CON (Motivation); +4 CHA (Advising Others); Must question life choices daily; -3 WIS (Structure); +6 CHA (Shared Experience Empathy); -4 CON (Rejoining Workforce); Take 2d6 psychic damage per week; +3 CON (Napping)

name: Perpetual Expat (Not Tourist)
prerequisites: Lived abroad 5+ years total, CHA 13+, Superiority complex
description: You haven't lived in your home country in years and look down on tourists
benefits: +4 INT (Local Knowledge); Advantage on INT (Navigating Systems); +3 INT (Language); +5 Intimidation (Newcomers); -6 CHA (Tourists); +2 Persuasion (Experience); Must correct tourists constantly; -4 WIS (Humility); +3 WIS (Settling In); -5 WIS (Patience with Questions); +4 Investigation (Finding Housing); Cannot admit to ever being a tourist; Take 1d6 psychic damage if called tourist

name: Spiritual Bypass Master
prerequisites: WIS appears 16+ actual 8-, CHA 14+, Avoided therapy
description: You use spirituality to avoid dealing with actual problems and trauma
benefits: +5 Performance (Appearing Wise); Advantage on Persuasion (Spiritual Topics); +4 Persuasion (Sounds Deep); -8 WIS (Actual Growth); +3 WIS (Meditation); -6 WIS (Accountability); Immunity to Criticism (Good Vibes Only); +2 Persuasion (Recruiting); -7 Insight (Facing Reality); Must respond to problems with platitudes; Cannot acknowledge negative emotions; +4 CHA (Seeming Enlightened); -9 CON (Actual Healing); Disadvantage on INT (Real Solutions)

name: Conspiracy Theorist Nomad
prerequisites: INT 12+, WIS 6-, Proficiency in Investigation, Paranoid trait
description: You moved abroad because of 5G, chemtrails, or the New World Order
benefits: +4 INT (Pattern Recognition - False Patterns); Advantage on WIS Saves (Questioning Narratives); +3 Investigation (Rabbit Holes); -9 CHA (Credibility); +5 INT (Connecting Unrelated Events); -7 CHA (Social Acceptance); Must share theories (compulsive); +2 CON (Preparedness); -8 WIS (Believing Experts); +3 INT (Alternative Media); Cannot trust government/science; -6 CHA (Rational People); +5 Persuasion (Like-Minded People); Take 2d6 psychic damage when shown evidence

name: Loud [Nationality Here]
prerequisites: CHA 13+, CON 14+, Volume permanently set to 11, Self-awareness 0
description: Your voice carries across continents and you're the main character everywhere
benefits: +5 Performance (Being Heard); Advantage on Intimidation (Presence Known); +4 Intimidation (Volume); -8 Stealth; +3 Performance (Natural Projection); -6 WIS (Cultural Sensitivity); Immunity to being ignored; +2 Persuasion (Confidence); -7 CHA (Blending In); Auto-fail Stealth (Subtle Situations); +4 Perception (Other Loud Nationals); Must dominate conversations; -5 CHA (Locals Seeking Peace); +3 Persuasion (Leading Groups Loudly)

name: Food Poisoning Survivor
prerequisites: CON 16+, Survived multiple severe cases, Stomach of questionable steel
description: You've seen things, gastrointestinal things, that would destroy weaker travelers
benefits: +6 CON Saves vs Disease; Advantage on CON Saves (Gut-Related); +5 Survival (Food Assessment); +4 CHA (Bonding Over Horror Stories); -3 WIS (Trusting Street Food - PTSD); +3 WIS (Medicine - Intimate Knowledge); Must share graphic details of experiences; +2 Persuasion (Warning Others); -4 CON (Eating Adventurously Now); Immunity to Mild Food Poisoning; Disadvantage on WIS Saves (Forgetting Trauma); +5 CHA (Empathy for Currently Ill)

name: No Boundaries
prerequisites: CHA 14+, WIS 6-, Proficiency in Performance
description: You think everywhere is a hostel common room and everyone wants to be friends
benefits: +6 CHA (Approaching Strangers); Advantage on Persuasion (Fast Friends); +4 Persuasion (Persistent); -8 Insight (Reading Social Cues); +5 CHA (Networking); -7 Insight (Recognizing Discomfort); Auto-fail Insight (Welcomeness); +3 Performance (Always Sharing Stories); -6 CHA (Professional Relationships); Must join every conversation; Immunity to Rejection (Don't Notice); -4 CHA (Invited to Things Again); +4 CHA (Extroversion); Disadvantage on WIS (Understanding Personal Space)

name: Perpetually Jetlagged
prerequisites: CON 12-, Traveled through 50+ time zones this year, Circadian rhythm destroyed
description: Your body has no idea what time it is and has given up trying to figure it out
benefits: +4 CON (Working Odd Hours); Advantage on CON Saves (Late-Night Activities); +3 CON (Running on Empty); -6 WIS (Schedule Consistency); +5 DEX (Flexibility); -5 CHA (Appearance - Bags Under Eyes); Immunity to Exhaustion (Jet Lag); +2 CHA (Relating to Insomniacs); -4 DEX (Morning Meetings); Must nap randomly; +3 Perception (Night Photography); -3 CON (Energy); Disadvantage on INT (Planning); +4 CON (24/7 Availability)

name: Living Off Savings
prerequisites: Wealth draining, No income, WIS 10-, Optimism fading
description: The runway is getting shorter and you're not thinking about landing yet
benefits: +4 WIS (Living in Present); Advantage on WIS Saves vs Worry (Yet); +3 CON (Enjoying Time Off); -6 INT (Financial Planning); +5 CHA (Freedom); -8 WIS (Long-Term Security); Must check bank account with dread daily; +2 CHA (Appreciating Experiences); -4 WIS (Sustainable Lifestyle); Take 1d10 psychic damage per month; +3 CHA (Adventure - Nothing to Lose); -500 GP per month; Disadvantage on INT (Future Planning); Must avoid calculating runway

name: VPN Dependent
prerequisites: Must have active VPN, Proficiency in Technology, Multiple subscriptions
description: Without your VPN you're locked out of work, banking, streaming, and your entire digital life
benefits: +5 INT (Accessing Geo-Blocked Content); Advantage on Stealth (Privacy); +4 INT (Technology); +3 INT (Bypassing Restrictions); -7 WIS When VPN Fails (Panic); Must have backup VPNs; +2 CHA (Teaching Others); -4 DEX (Simple Browsing - Latency); +6 CHA (Streaming from Home Country); Cannot function without it; -3 CHA (Video Calls - Quality); +4 INT (Digital Security); Take 4d6 psychic damage if VPN dies during work; Must troubleshoot connection issues constantly

name: Serial Zoom Caller (3AM Edition)
prerequisites: Remote worker, Any timezone, CON 13+, Hates scheduling
description: You take calls at ungodly hours to overlap with home office timezone
benefits: +5 Performance (Appearing Dedicated); Advantage on GP (Earning Remotely); +4 INT (Multitasking Half-Asleep); -7 CON (Sleep Quality); +3 GP (Income Maintenance); -6 CHA (Social Life - Odd Hours); Must wake up for calls regardless; +2 CHA (Empathy from Colleagues); -4 CON (Energy During Local Day); +5 CON (Coffee Dependency); -3 CON (Health); Take 1d8 necrotic damage per call; +4 Performance (Looking Committed); Disadvantage on Persuasion (Maintaining Local Friendships)
